ActPayments in Lieu of Taxes Act
PrecisAppointment of GUY J. BOURGEOIS of St. Albert, Alberta; PATRICIA LYNN COOPER of Calgary, Alberta; and MATHIEU L'ÉCUYER of Québec, Quebec to be members of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and reappointment of LINDA DIANE GARBER of Halifax, Nova Scotia and MICHAEL G. DRAKE of Cornwall, Prince Edward Island as members of the Payments in Lieu of Taxes Dispute Advisory Panel to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years.
